  - Ask the patient if they have any remaining questions about the diet changes and warmly respond.
Bowel prep:
  - Tell the patient the other main step to remember is drinking the laxative solution the night before their procedure.   - Warmly ask what kind of questions the patient has about their bowel prep. Respond to any followup questions to demonstrate that you care. And mention that some people don't have any problems and are able to drink all the bowel prep just fine
Npo:
  - Now transition to the next part of the patient's prep which is when to stop eating and drinking everything before their procedure. Tell the patient they will need to finish their laxative solution and stop everything 4 hours before their procedure.
